website_summaries.verdict: A first-rate fish fillet cleaning table that is intended for use during fishing excursions, picnics, camping trips, and other outdoor activities.
pros: Folds for easy storage and transport
Can can be used to clean different fish, meats, fruits ,and vegetables
Top is expertly crafted from high-end plastic
cons: Large faucet and drain sometimes make it difficult to move the table between destinations

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and super-handy
customer_reviews.text: Pretty spanky! I customized mine by bolting it to a 1" tube steel cart with wheels and put a trash bin at the end from the sink that pops out so, I can just slide the waste right off the end of the table into it. (I couldn't find one made that way). Note of caution: If you buy one don't tell too many people you have it: they all want to borrow it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great hand washing station!
customer_reviews.text: The faucet is a pain to take off and put back on (we take it off for easier storage when we're not using it) but other than that, its a great little table that serves its purpose. We often use it as a simple hand washing station for when we have employee lunches on the job site - works perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Ordered because of the good reviews. Came without the necessary screw for the ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered because of the good reviews. Came without the necessary screw for the drain.....when called was told would take 10 weeks to have one sent so gave us a partial refund. Purchased the machine screw at the hardware. Had to take leg assembly off to be able to attach the hose to the faucet under the table..this after trying to get my fingers past the leg to tighten the nut.....not enough room for fingers or pliers....not difficult to do..remove 4 screws on each side and the entire leg assembly comes off . Once assembled though all working well.
customer_reviews.author: linda huppert

customer_reviews.title: NOT good for being portable
customer_reviews.text: The faucet is almost IMPOSSIBLE to take on and off with the little space provided in the corner of the table. It is not a quick or good portable solution. You will need a wrench to tighten it enough so it wont leak and it is very hard to fit one in the tight space.
customer_reviews.author: Speedy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to use outside of a porta potty at a graduation party. It was easy to assemble and kept guests out of the house but able to clean their hands.
customer_reviews.author: jonap

customer_reviews.title: Gift for Husband
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my husband who needed a table to clean his fish. He was very excited to see this and all the features it offers. This is a great table at a great price for any fisherman.
customer_reviews.author: C Smith

customer_reviews.title: He was really happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Christmas. He has not had a chance to use it yet but he has taken it out and set it up. He was really happy with it, so hopefully he will use it soon and I can let you know how well it works. He did say it was easy to setup and take down.
customer_reviews.author: tam

customer_reviews.title: Great table for cleaning any wild game
customer_reviews.text: I love this table. I hunt and I fish and it's great for cleaning and butchering fish and deer. My wife loves that I'm not using her sink and counter for processing my catches. The sink with the garden hose attachment and extendable drain work great. The table itself cleans easily and is large enough for deer sized game and smaller. It would probably work on larger game, but I don't hunt anything larger.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Beauchamp

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this! I use this outside our camper for all the outdoor cooking and grilling and it works perfectly! The water hook up leaked a little but nothing some good ole teflon tape didnt cure! Its been outside since day one uncovered in rain, blazing sun, and high winds... Still looks and works as the day I unboxed it. Highly recommend! Best purchase made!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great height, hooks up to water hose so you have running water as you clean.
customer_reviews.text: Great table, great height so you don't have to bend over the table as you fillet. Fast shipping, received the day before expected arrival date.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Hendrix

customer_reviews.title: Good outdoor sink
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I needed to get a sink added to my outdoor kitchen
customer_reviews.author: James C.

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, durable
customer_reviews.text: Stable, sturdy, durable, and easily able to clean. Hook up works well with a hose.
customer_reviews.author: John johnson

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend buying this product
customer_reviews.text: The legs on this table where they lock together are hard to lock and has already started to rust at the hinges. The facet is a JOKE! It is impossible to hook a hose to the facet due to the fact that it is most difficult to get any type of fastening wrench to tighten the nut that secure the facet securely
customer_reviews.author: Carl Brown

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to clean meat
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband to cut up deer meat and he loves it. Exactly what he needed and keeps the mess out of my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: cef

customer_reviews.title: good to have
customer_reviews.text: You don't realize you need this table until you need it. Not just for outdoors man. Great for out door gatherings.
customer_reviews.author: tomeka

customer_reviews.title: This was a reorder - the first one was badly ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a reorder - the first one was badly damaged - this one only had one crack in it - the hole in the sink is not drilled out to accept the drain - I guess the QC manager was on vacation that week......unless you're prepared to spend some time making it work as I did, buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: F. A. Vogel

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my parents. They love camping and this was a great addition to their outdoor setup. Makes clean up much more convenient.
customer_reviews.author: C. F.

customer_reviews.title: Best choice...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a fish/crab/chicken processing table, and it serves that purpose. The legs are sturdy enough that it doesnt wobble, and it packs up flat to save space in my shed. Smart buy. Saw one just like this at cabals for $139.
customer_reviews.author: TheGuyFromNJ

customer_reviews.title: Table works for us.
customer_reviews.text: The portable fish cleaning table was just what we needed. It's lightweight enough to move inside when not being used, but sturdy. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara M.

customer_reviews.title: If those problems didn’t happen it would be a great table. Reason I didn’t call about damage is ...
customer_reviews.text: Damaged in freight. Water does not shut completely off. If those problems didn’t happen it would be a great table. Reason I didn’t call about damage is we are on the road and have limited access to internet
customer_reviews.author: servicer

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: I love that the table is portable and has a sink. We use it a lot and now my dad uses it to clean the fish. He can do it right outside and not stink up the house...LOL
customer_reviews.author: Putina Warren

customer_reviews.title: we still love the table
customer_reviews.text: Having to buy new fixture parts within a month but, we still love the table. Makes a great addition to outdoor oyster roasts.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy S

customer_reviews.title: Great for many uses
customer_reviews.text: This table is great. We use it almost weekly for filleting fish. We also take it camping with us and use it as a dish washing station. I love the fact that it is counter height and there is minimal bending when doing tasks with this table.
customer_reviews.author: mamie williams

customer_reviews.title: Has plastic parts that fall apart in the sun.
customer_reviews.text: Lots of plastic parts that decomposed in the sunlight. Faucet, drain, accordion-like drain hose, etc. Now, a couple of years later, I essentially have a folding table.
customer_reviews.author: raro

customer_reviews.title: Great table and sink combo!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 13 year old son who loves to fish and hunt. He already used it for duck cleaning and the sink is very convenient. No more messes inside and it cleans easily!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Nice portable table. Folds up easy and can be put away till needed. I can now clean fish in my backyard instead of having to make a mess in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Hammer

customer_reviews.title: The height is great. The drain connection is not as strong as ...
customer_reviews.text: I use mine often. The height is great. The drain connection is not as strong as I would like.
customer_reviews.author: Big Game Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Very good value
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband for Xmas last year so he could clean his fish without bringing inside to my sink in the kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Linda T.

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Great pop up table for fish cleaning! We love it.
customer_reviews.author: McGyver

customer_reviews.title: Can also be used as a garden planter table or camping sink
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and VERY heavy! It is a tall table so I don't think someone shorter than 5'6" would find it comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Gonna be great on campers patio.
customer_reviews.text: I havent taken it camping but having assembled it, I'm sure it will be great. I want to create shelf on leg supports.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fish cleaning table
customer_reviews.text: Awesome fish cleaning table, very stable...and you can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: D Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: No the best quality but really handy for the cash!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Peddie

customer_reviews.title: A fisherman’s thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this! It folds down and is compact.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: It is super, but the faucet on the right side behind ...
customer_reviews.text: It is super, but the faucet on the right side behind the sink, the best location, make it "unique"
customer_reviews.author: Papo Acevedo

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect for watering and clean up
customer_reviews.text: I use it for my garden planting, etc. It is perfect for watering and clean up. Also, makes a great camping outdoor kitchen sink for small clean ups and hand washing. Every home should have at least one!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Its good for cleaning up and rinsing without having to go ...
customer_reviews.text: Its good for cleaning up and rinsing without having to go in and out of our camper. The sink is very shallow, though.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: It's awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Came as described. My Step Father has been using it since Christmas and he's been loving it.
customer_reviews.author: Chester

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Everything l wanted in a table. I'm tall so I like the 37 inch legs. It is very sturdy too
customer_reviews.author: Skipper

customer_reviews.title: Good cleaning table!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my fishing husband. Great table for cleaning fish! Portable and good value.
customer_reviews.author: Kay T.

customer_reviews.title: Having sink and faucet is great.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my husband who is a big fishermen. He loves it. Having sink and faucet is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks to be a quality product and easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Martin

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved it... Our friend saw it and ordered one ..
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Portable yet Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for an avid fisherman-- he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: L. Garrison

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: It did not come with the faucet as described. I gave it as a gift. I would like to ask someone to mail me the faucet but it seems difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Callegari

customer_reviews.title: Missing screw to secure drain.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this, but we had to buy a screw to secure the drain. Otherwise it is great.
customer_reviews.author: A fellow Tennessean

customer_reviews.title: Good table for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good table for the money, the sink hardware is very cheap and wont work without buying some replacement pieces at the hardware store.
customer_reviews.author: TN Fisherman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: got this for my dad for fathers day. he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: rb

customer_reviews.title: It folds nicely and can be stored away
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his table and he uses it to fillet fish. It folds nicely and can be stored away.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie Andre

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: We used las weekend and is so helpful. We cleaned fish so inside everything was perfect
customer_reviews.author: claudia

customer_reviews.title: We are using this in our back yard for a ...
customer_reviews.text: We are using this in our back yard for a mud pie kitchen. We cut off the legs with a regular saw so my toddler could reach
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Espinoza

customer_reviews.title: Excellent BBQ table
customer_reviews.text: Took along time to arrive, but is well built and tall
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Great table
customer_reviews.text: Great table. Faucet sort of hard to tighten up. Table is the right height and solid built. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Scorp87

customer_reviews.title: Its is a good buy for the money but a few improvements can ...
customer_reviews.text: Its is a good buy for the money but a few improvements can be made so you can turn the bolts
customer_reviews.author: Terry Arrington

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my dad on fathers day. Quality is better than expected. Sits at the perfect height. Will definitely order one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: SMH79

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Got exactly what I expected in the time frame that was guaranteed.
customer_reviews.author: Lacera Smith

customer_reviews.title: It works for what I use it for.
customer_reviews.text: Works really well in my BBQ Summer shed. Only complaint is the sink section is just not deep enough. It is only about 2 inches and just not deep enough to use like a sink.
customer_reviews.author: DrKay

customer_reviews.title: Functional and durable
customer_reviews.text: Table is better than I thought it would be for the price. Table top is heavy duty nylon type composite and is thick and rugged. Sink size is ideal for rinsing cleaned fish, venison, and rinsing off knives and utensils. Faucet (connects to garden hose) and drain assembly is well made for the application. Ideal height and table legs are built to hold up heavy items like large fish or deer. With normal care this table will last for a very long time!
customer_reviews.author: KGB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved it! It's made solid & well crafted to last!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves loves this!!! We use ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves loves this !!! We use this to cut vegetables from the garden it is made things so much easier!!
customer_reviews.author: mends

customer_reviews.title: Use it as a bonsai working area. Works OK ...
customer_reviews.text: Use it as a bonsai working area. Works OK for that. The hose tubing had a hole in it and leaked from the start. Had to find a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Novak Jr.

customer_reviews.title: It works great and he loves it
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son as he loves to fish. It works great and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan C. Nabors

customer_reviews.title: Great height, easy clean
customer_reviews.text: We use this for processing deer meat. The height makes it much more comfortable to work at than the typical table/bar top. It rinses clean and can be stored away easily. The faucet aspect is nice, but we often find we don't even use it. We just use the table itself, really, because we don't want to have to hook up the water hose, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Momof4@Peace

customer_reviews.title: Folding Portable Fish Fillet & Hunting & Cutting Table with Sink...
customer_reviews.text: For the moment I'm going to give this a 4; possibly moving up to the 5 later. It was a gift for my husband and I'll tell you he was so excited about it. We unboxed it right in the living room and he says it is "THE PERFECT HEIGHT!" and will definitely save him from all the bending while trying to clean fish! So yes I'd say buy it-n-try it cause you just might like it too!
customer_reviews.author: P.R. I've It

customer_reviews.title: GREAT GIFT
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my father in law for Christmas and he LOVES it. He put it together right on the spot! It's awesome!
customer_reviews.author: courtney

customer_reviews.title: My hubby loves it
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect ! My hubby loves to fish now he's happy with this table he's so comfortable cleaning his salmon on here...
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for, could not find ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for, could not find anywhere else. First time using Amazon, but definitely will use again. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Jones

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: as described in ad. great help to fishermen.. it was a Christmas present. it will get a lot of use. thanks
customer_reviews.author: Jan langley

customer_reviews.title: Handy Portable Cleaning Table
customer_reviews.text: After many searches at various Sporting goods stores, this was a bargain! Husband was very excited about the height of the table, no more bending over to clean the fish! Perfect! Plus, with Prime membership, FREE shipping! Winner!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Keen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: GAVE TO DAD FOR FATHER'S DAY HE LIKES IT IT'S DIFFERENT
customer_reviews.author: churyce robinson

customer_reviews.title: I love this table.
customer_reviews.text: I love this table. If you have an outside in your life...you need this table. Great for camping, cleaning fish and game. Gardening...cleaning vegetables. Super easy to set up and break down. Or just leave it out all yeah. Even if you have an RV sink or garage sink. You need this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very easy to plumb and store in garage
customer_reviews.text: I use this for just about all types of fish, very easy to plumb and store in garage. Also great for when i BBQ, can wash my hands, utensils etc. Quality of product is very good. This is my third one I have bought, one for myself and two for friends. Recommend this product for anyone it has multiple uses.
customer_reviews.author: maurice seibell

customer_reviews.title: husband loved
customer_reviews.text: husband really liked, something different, we can take it camping, very light weight, easy to store, should work great. thank you
customer_reviews.author: Carly leach

customer_reviews.title: Faucet started rusting immediately
customer_reviews.text: I do like using this table and sink for rinsing and cleaning vegetables from my garden. The table is a nice height - I'm a 5'6" tall woman. This table is 3 inches taller than many like it. The bad news is that the faucet started rusting as soon as we set up the table. We leave it outside all of the time, and it looks like we will have to be looking for a replacement faucet before next summer.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy L. Koontz

customer_reviews.title: All looks good at this point
customer_reviews.text: The table came with a broken piece that sets in the drain, however it was cheaper to replace it at the local hardware then try to send it back. All looks good at this point, but haven't actually put it to use as it is the dead of winter presently.
customer_reviews.author: GeeWhiz

customer_reviews.title: Very poor design. The faucet and drain make this nearly ...
customer_reviews.text: Very poor design. The faucet and drain make this nearly impossible to fold and transport.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: The legs on one side were slightly difficult to lock open but otherwise it is excellent for me. I expecially like the height!
customer_reviews.author: bonesandbabies

customer_reviews.title: It worked great and I anticipate that it will work fine
customer_reviews.text: I haven't cleaned a fish on it yet but I did head a bunch of shrimp I netted. It worked great and I anticipate that it will work fine. The real test will be with a big dolphin or wahoo. The way it folds the faucet and drain hose are in the way for storage but I don't see it as a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Anderson

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The faucet lasted only 6 months and the company won't sell me another one.
customer_reviews.author: Diane S. Miller

customer_reviews.title: I'm very pleased with the quality of the table
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with the quality of the table, the facet, the drain, and table height makes it much easier on my back to clean fish. Once fall fishing was over, I took it back apart, folded it up like a card table and slid it under the bed until spring fishing. The table arrived in a short time and undamaged.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: FISH CLEANING TABLE
customer_reviews.text: I WAS HAPPY TO SEE HOW WELL IT WAS CONSTRUCTED AND WOULD HAVE RATED IT HIGHER IF IT WERE MORE PORTABLE.
customer_reviews.author: jeff simpson

customer_reviews.title: Stop budding me
customer_reviews.text: Well I like my table will work good in my vending cart way do I have to do a revew im tired of writhing a stupid revew.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome table, sink combo, No leaks .flows great and went up fast. I added a filter to it, pretty cool for camping.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Clark

product_meta.title: Best Choice Products Portable Outdoor Fish and Game Cutting Cleaning Table w/Sink and Faucet
product_meta.description: You can take this table to picnics, camping, fishing and almost any kind of outdoor activity. It folds for easy storage and transport and can be used to clean different meats, fruits and vegetables. Also can be used for food preparation, game cleaning, BBQ prep and more. Features: folding legs for easy storage; Station top is made of extremely durable plastic; weight: 22 lbs. ; stainless steel faucet with Garden Hose hook-up; color: off-white. Specifications: overall dimensions: 24 (L) x 46 (W) x 37 (H); sink dimensions: 10 (L) x 15 (W) x 3 (D); sink Pipe extends from 13 -33 ; little Assembly required, instructions included.
feature_bullets: PERFECT FOR CAMPING, FISHING, AND MORE: Tabletop workstation comes with sink, faucet, and ample space to prepare, cut and clean fish, meat, and vegetables on every trip
PORTABLE AND CONVENIENT: Folding legs and lightweight design make it easy to transport the table from the car to the campsite, beach, or park or store away in a closet or garage when not in use
EXTENDABLE PIPE: Sink pipe has an adjustable length from 13 to 33 inches to give you the ability to hook up a garden hose from different locations and provide a reliable, steady water flow
DURABLE AND STRONG: Heavy-duty plastic material can withstand years of travel, adventure, and use to provide an outdoor accessory and tool that's built to last
MULTIPURPOSE USAGE: Can be used to wash hands and freshen up on a weekend trip, prepare meals, and organize various tools and supplies; OVERALL DIMENSIONS: 24"(L) x 46"(W) x 37"(H)
